title: App crashes all the time on login if change network while DataSync enabled

labels.name: core-ui-grooming
labels.description: To be reviewed on the next core ui grooming to add the issue to team board and set priority

body:
***Type***: Bug

***Summary***: When user has enabled DataSync and then switching to different network - there is no way to login to account after. Status crashes all the time after entering valid password. 
Can create new account or recover different account, but no way to login to the one who changed network while DataSync enabled

Not reproducible with iOS but only Android. 

#### Expected behavior

Can login to account with DataSync enabled after network changed

#### Actual behavior

Can NOT login to account (app crashes) with DataSync enabled after network changed

Video of behavior: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qdm5yob-5wxnnLR7qyldAJRVjt1d6gfL/view?usp=sharing


### Reproduction

- Open Status and create new account
- Navigate to `Profile` -> `Advanced` -> enable `Developpment mode`
- Enable `DataSync Enabled` setting
- Re-login to account (as suggested in the pop-up after enabling DataSync)
- Change network to different one (e.g. POA/xDAI/Ropsten)
- Login to account


### Additional Information

- Status version: Develop nighty 0.14.0 (2019082902)
- Operating System: Android only

#### Logs

Logcat logs when tap "Sign In" for above scenario

@Serhy this should be fixed in develop, thanks!

Indeed @cammellos! Can't reproduce anymore with both iOS and Android develop builds (messaging keep working as well disregard the network user is connected to) 
Closing the issue
